statements: DELETE FROM customers WHERE email = 'john.doe@example.com' AND age > 30;
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 123 AND age > 30;
DELETE FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com' AND phone_number IS NOT NULL;
DELETE FROM sales WHERE sale_amount > 1000 AND sale_date < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM purchase_history WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM customers_demographic_data WHERE gender='Female' AND age > 30);
DELETE FROM purchase_history WHERE customer_id = 100 AND total_amount > 500
